page.title: 03Farming - Perry Hill Orchard
page.content: These are the chemicals that the orchard use for spraying the trees. Fungicid - Melprex,Rubigan,Topas, Delan-Col and Benlate. Insecticide - Metasystox - aphids Carbaryl - caterpillars, Decis - caterpillars, Plictran - red spider mites. Weed Killer - Gramoxong, Weeddazol,Simazing and Vanzar. Feed - Maxicrop - liquid seaweed, Nitram-34.5% nitrogen. This is the machinery they use at Perry Hill: Tractors- Ford 4600, Lambourghini,some minitaurus and a M.F.35. In addition to these there are Kinkeloer air mist sprayers,All Man 80 sprayer and two knapsacks. A lind fork lift is used for moving fruit boxes.
